text: Tini allah‌ to kebala tomadera upara harama karechena mrta jantu [1], rakta [2], sukarera gos‌ta [3] ebam yara upara allah‌ra nama chara an'yera nama uccarita hayeche [4], kintu ye nirupaya athaca napharamana ebam simalanghanakari naya tara kono papa habe na [5]. Nisaca'i allah‌ ati ksamasila, parama dayalu
